Download explanation: Iwe rẹ ti ṣetan, a n fi imeeli ranṣẹ si ọ paapaa.
Sorry, we couldn't save: Ma binu, a ko le fipamọ
Subject: Koko-ọrọ
closed:
## o ṣeun si awọn alatilẹyin {{total}}!

A ti paade iṣe yii, ṣugbọn iṣẹ wa ko pari nihin, nitorinaa jọwọ fi imeeli rẹ silẹ lati jẹ ki alaye nipa awọn igbesẹ ti n bọ ***

consent.confirm: <0> Ṣe o da ọ loju? </0> <1> Nipa yiyan 'Bẹẹkọ', iwọ kii yoo ni anfani lati rii boya ipolongo yii ba ṣaṣeyọri, tabi ti o ba wa igbese diẹ sii ti a nilo lati ṣe papọ lati ṣẹgun rẹ. Ti o ba yan 'Bẹẹni' a yoo jẹ ki o ni imudojuiwọn nipa eyi ati awọn ipolongo amojuto ni miiran wa.
consent.confirmOptIn: Maṣe gbagbe lati ṣayẹwo apoti leta rẹ (pẹlu folda àwúrúju rẹ!) Ati jẹrisi ṣiṣe alabapin imeeli rẹ
consent.implicit: Fi fọọmu yii silẹ lati gba awọn imeeli lati {{name}}
consent.intro: Wa diẹ sii nipa awọn ipolongo wa, awọn iṣe ati ilọsiwaju {{campaign}}
consent.opt-in: Bẹẹni, Mo fẹ {{partner}} lati jẹ ki n sọ fun mi nipasẹ imeeli
consent.opt-in-both: Bẹẹni, Mo fẹ {{partner}} ati {{lead}} lati jẹ ki n sọ fun mi nipasẹ imeeli
consent.opt-out: Rara, maṣe fi imeeli ranṣẹ si mi tabi jẹ ki n ṣe imudojuiwọn ni ọjọ iwaju
consent.processing: Alaye ti ara ẹni rẹ yoo wa ni ikọkọ ati ni aabo ni aabo. Nipa ifisilẹ alaye o ti gba si lilo data ati awọn kuki ni ibamu pẹlu <1> eto imulo wa </1>

ask.weekly: Ṣe eyi ni ẹbun ọsẹ kan?
